title: SPIRITUAL CLEANSING HERB PACK
description: This Herb Mix Contains all the Herbs needed to remove negative energy all you have to do is simply boil it, for 30-45 min. let cool strain add some cascarilla and liquid Asafetida and any other ingredients prescribed in your reading. Take for 3 consecutive evenings From the shoulders down. This pack is enough for 3 Spiritual Baths. On the 5th day start your sweet herb baths with 5 or 7 different colognes. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY (KEEP REFRIGERATED UNTIL USE) ALL BATHS TO BE TAKEN FROM THE SHOULDERS DOWN Este paquete de yerbas amargas sirven para alejar toda energía negativa y espíritus oscuros, Instrucciones: Hervir por espacio de 30-45 minutos dejarla enfriar y colarla, añadirle cascarilla y Asafetida liquida y echárselo de los hombros para abajo por espacio de tres noches. al 5to dia asegurese de bañarse con yerbas dulce. PARA USO EXTERNO SOLAMENTE (MANTENGASE REFRIGERADO)
sitename: Eve The Medium - Psychic Medium specialized in energy clearing
